languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт смотрит на останки в ваших руках с нескрываемым изумлением, которое сменяется гневом.{/n} "Ты прав{mf||а}, элантах! О, Муаран, какая низость! И это цена твоей судьбы? Цена твоего пути?!" {n}Разъяренная женщина бросает на вас взгляд и тут же отворачивается.{/n} "Забери это... прошу тебя..."

{n}Yrliet looks at the skull in your hands with unconcealed astonishment that quickly turns to anger.{/n} "You are right, elantach. Oh, Muaran, such vileness! And this is the price of your fate? The price of your path?" {n}The enraged Aeldari looks at you and turns her back.{/n} "Take that away... please..."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт смотрит на останки в ваших руках с нескрываемым изумлением, которое сменяется гневом.{/n} "Ты прав{mf||а}, элантах! О, Муаран, какая низость! И это цена твоей судьбы? Цена твоего пути?!" {n}Разъяренная женщина бросает на вас взгляд и тут же отворачивается.{/n} "Забери это... прошу тебя..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet looks at the skull in your hands with unconcealed astonishment that quickly turns to anger.{/n} "Khurat bagana kharey! You are right, el'antar. Oh, Muaran, such vileness! And this is the price of your fate? The price of your path?" {n}The enraged Aeldari looks at you and turns her back.{/n} "Take that away... please..."

And this is the price of your fate? The price of your path?" {n}The enraged Aeldari looks at you and turns her back.{/n} "Take that away... please..."

And this is the price of your fate? The price of your path?" {n}The enraged Aeldari looks at you and turns her back.{/n} "Take that away... please..."

{n}Yrliet looks at the skull in your hands with unconcealed astonishment that quickly turns to anger.{/n} "You are right, elantach. Oh, Muaran, such vileness! And this is the price of your fate? The price of your path?" {n}The enraged Aeldari looks at you and turns her back.{/n} "Take that away... please..."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特看着你手中的头骨，脸上露出了难以掩饰的震惊表情，随后变成了愤怒。{/n}“你说得没错，外界人。噢，穆兰，你真是太卑鄙了！这就是你的命运的代价吗？这就是你的道途的代价吗？”{n}伊莉耶特怒不可遏。她看了你一眼，之后转过了身。{/n}“把它拿走吧……拜托……”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at the skull in your hands with unconcealed astonishment that quickly turns to anger.{/n} "You are right, elantach. Oh, Muaran, such vileness! And this is the price of your fate? The price of your path?" {n}The enraged Aeldari looks at you and turns her back.{/n} "Take that away... please..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特看着你手中的头骨，脸上露出了难以掩饰的震惊表情，随后变成了愤怒。{/n}“你说得没错，外界人。噢，穆兰，你真是太卑鄙了！这就是你的命运的代价吗？这就是你的道途的代价吗？”{n}伊莉耶特怒不可遏。她看了你一眼，之后转过了身。{/n}“把它拿走吧……拜托……”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet observa el cráneo de tus manos con una incredulidad evidente que no tarda en convertirse en furia.{/n} «Tienes razón, elantach. ¡Oh, Muaran, qué vileza! ¿Y este es el precio de tu destino? ¿El precio de tu senda?». {n}La Aeldari iracunda te mira antes de darte la espalda.{/n} «Aleja eso de mí... por favor...».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at the skull in your hands with unconcealed astonishment that quickly turns to anger.{/n} "You are right, elantach. Oh, Muaran, such vileness! And this is the price of your fate? The price of your path?" {n}The enraged Aeldari looks at you and turns her back.{/n} "Take that away... please..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet observa el cráneo de tus manos con una incredulidad evidente que no tarda en convertirse en furia.{/n} «Tienes razón, elantach. ¡Oh, Muaran, qué vileza! ¿Y este es el precio de tu destino? ¿El precio de tu senda?». {n}La Aeldari iracunda te mira antes de darte la espalda.{/n} «Aleja eso de mí... por favor...».

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはあなたの手中にある頭蓋骨を見ると、驚きを露わにする。だがそれはすぐ怒りへと変わる。{/n}「そのようだな、エランタ。ああ、ムアラン、何と卑劣な！これが運命の対価というのか？あなたの道の代償なのか？」{n}激昂するアエルダリはあなたを見て背を向ける。{/n}「それをどこかに…お願いだ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at the skull in your hands with unconcealed astonishment that quickly turns to anger.{/n} "You are right, elantach. Oh, Muaran, such vileness! And this is the price of your fate? The price of your path?" {n}The enraged Aeldari looks at you and turns her back.{/n} "Take that away... please..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはあなたの手中にある頭蓋骨を見ると、驚きを露わにする。だがそれはすぐ怒りへと変わる。{/n}「そのようだな、エランタ。ああ、ムアラン、何と卑劣な！これが運命の対価というのか？あなたの道の代償なのか？」{n}激昂するアエルダリはあなたを見て背を向ける。{/n}「それをどこかに…お願いだ…」

languages.text: {n}Yrliet betrachtet den Schädel in deinen Händen mit unverhohlenem Erstaunen, das rasch zu Wut wird.{/n} "Ihr habt recht, Elantach. Oh, Muaran, welch Schändlichkeit! Und das ist der Preis Eures Schicksals? Der Preis Eures Pfads?" {n}Die erzürnte Aeldari sieht dich an und wendet sich um.{/n} "Nehmt das weg ... bitte ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at the skull in your hands with unconcealed astonishment that quickly turns to anger.{/n} "You are right, elantach. Oh, Muaran, such vileness! And this is the price of your fate? The price of your path?" {n}The enraged Aeldari looks at you and turns her back.{/n} "Take that away... please..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet betrachtet den Schädel in deinen Händen mit unverhohlenem Erstaunen, das rasch zu Wut wird.{/n} "Ihr habt recht, Elantach. Oh, Muaran, welch Schändlichkeit! Und das ist der Preis Eures Schicksals? Der Preis Eures Pfads?" {n}Die erzürnte Aeldari sieht dich an und wendet sich um.{/n} "Nehmt das weg ... bitte ..."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet regarde le crâne dans vos mains avec un étonnement non dissimulé qui se change rapidement en colère.{/n} « Vous avez raison, elantach. Oh, Muaran, quelle infamie ! Est-ce là le prix de votre destin ? De votre voie ? » {n}L'Aeldari furieuse vous lance un regard puis se détourne.{/n} « Rangez-le... s'il vous plaît... »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at the skull in your hands with unconcealed astonishment that quickly turns to anger.{/n} "You are right, elantach. Oh, Muaran, such vileness! And this is the price of your fate? The price of your path?" {n}The enraged Aeldari looks at you and turns her back.{/n} "Take that away... please..."

Est-ce là le prix de votre destin ? De votre voie ? » {n}L'Aeldari furieuse vous lance un regard puis se détourne.{/n} « Rangez-le... s'il vous plaît... »

And this is the price of your fate? The price of your path?" {n}The enraged Aeldari looks at you and turns her back.{/n} "Take that away... please..."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, elindeki kafatasına gizlemeye çalışmadığı bir hayretle bakıyor. Bu hayreti hızla öfkeye dönüşüyor.{/n} "Haklısın elantach. Ah Muaran, bu nasıl bir kötülüktür! Kaderinin, yolunun bedeli bu mu olacaktı?" {n}Öfkeli Aeldari sana bakıyor ve sırtını dönüyor.{/n} "Bunu benden uzak tut lütfen."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at the skull in your hands with unconcealed astonishment that quickly turns to anger.{/n} "You are right, elantach. Oh, Muaran, such vileness! And this is the price of your fate? The price of your path?" {n}The enraged Aeldari looks at you and turns her back.{/n} "Take that away... please..."

Kaderinin, yolunun bedeli bu mu olacaktı?" {n}Öfkeli Aeldari sana bakıyor ve sırtını dönüyor.{/n} "Bunu benden uzak tut lütfen."
